Posts.Content: hello im a breast cancer survivor last 8 years. im done mastectomy on my left side. i dont hav any pill to take as my DCIS IS NOT CANCER hormone depend. i had done my chemotheraphy. so far so good, juz followed normal medical check up. But recently I hav aproblem- 1) i feel my left chest heavy- i had done ecg- good for heart problem. the feel of heaviness goes off n come back and will last for 5-15 mins 2) my hand n my shoulder- the whole of my left handside feel numb from shoulder to finger. i can feel pain but i feel numbness. anybody can share their experience mayb i need to go back to my surgeon back Â  thankyou for sharing
Posts.Title: hand numbness
